item.title: 特斯拉 Cybertruck 与 Model Y 项目负责人相继离职
item.guid: 特斯拉-Cybertruck-与-Model-Y-项目负责人相继离职
item.description:
According to Reuters, Siddhant Awasthi, head of the Tesla Cybertruck project, announced his departure on November 9, ending his more than eight-year career at the company. 据路透社报道，特斯拉 Cybertruck 项目负责人 Siddhant Awasthi 于 11 月 9 日宣布离职，结束其在公司超过八年的职业生涯。

It is reported that Awasthi initially joined Tesla as an intern, later leading the entire process of the Cybertruck from engineering R&D to mass production, and also served as the Model 3 project leader starting last July. 据悉，Awasthi 最初以实习生身份加入特斯拉，后主导 Cybertruck 从工程研发到量产的全过程，并在去年 7 月起兼任 Model 3 项目负责人。

He posted on LinkedIn: "When I joined as an intern eight years ago, I never imagined having the opportunity to lead the Cybertruck project and bring it to reality." 他在领英发文表示：「八年前作为实习生加入时，从未想过有机会领导 Cybertruck 项目并将其推向现实。」

Later the same day, Emmanuel Lamacchia, Tesla's Model Y project manager, also announced his departure on LinkedIn, ending his nearly eight-year tenure. 同一天晚些时候，特斯拉 Model Y 项目经理 Emmanuel Lamacchia 也在领英宣布离职，结束其近八年的任期。

Since 2018, Lamacchia has been responsible for the production and global promotion of the Model Y, and previously led the new product introduction for both Model 3 and Model Y. Lamacchia 自 2018 年起负责 Model Y 的生产与全球推广，曾主导 Model 3 与 Model Y 的新产品导入工作。

He wrote in a statement: "It has been an extraordinary journey, from new product introduction to becoming the Model Y project manager, witnessing this model become the world's best-selling car." 他在声明中写道：「这是一段非凡旅程，从新产品导入到成为 Model Y 项目经理，见证了这款车型成为全球最畅销汽车。」

Public information shows that over the past year, several senior project managers have left Tesla, including Daniel Ho, who was responsible for the launch of Model 3, and David Zhang, who was responsible for Model S and Model X. 公开资料显示，过去一年，特斯拉已有多位资深项目经理离开，包括负责 Model 3 推出的 Daniel Ho 及负责 Model S 与 Model X 的 David Zhang。

item.title: 图灵奖得主杨立昆将从 Meta 离职独立创业
item.guid: 图灵奖得主杨立昆将从-Meta-离职独立创业
item.description:
Image from The Financial Times

According to The Financial Times, Turing Award winner and Meta's Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun will leave Meta within the next few months and is preparing to establish a new AI startup. 据《金融时报》消息， 图灵奖得主、Meta 首席人工智能科学家 Yann LeCun（杨立昆）将在未来几个月内离开 Meta，并且将筹备创立一家新的 AI 初创企业。

Sources revealed that LeCun has begun early negotiations with potential investors. Reportedly, LeCun will found a company focused on "world models" (world models: AI systems develop an internal understanding of their environment by learning from video and spatial data, rather than relying entirely on text). 知情人士透露，杨立昆已经开始与潜在投资方展开早期谈判。据报道，杨立昆将创立一家专注于「世界模型」的公司（世界模型：AI 系统通过学习视频和空间数据来发展对环境的内部理解，而不是完全依赖文本）。

It is understood that LeCun joined Facebook (Meta's predecessor) in 2013 and served as the founding director of Fundamental AI Research (FAIR). 据悉，杨立昆于 2013 年加入 Facebook（Meta 前身），并出任基础人工智能研究（FAIR）的创始主任。

However, in June this year, Meta made a significant investment in data labeling company Scale AI, and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg appointed Scale AI's CEO Alexandr Wang as the new head of Meta's Super Intelligence Lab, which consequently led to a change in LeCun's reporting structure. 而在今年 6 月，Meta 却大手笔的投资了数据标注公司 Scale AI，并且 Meta CEO 扎克伯格将后者的 CEO Alexandr Wang 任命为 Meta 超级智能实验室的新领导人，也因此导致杨立昆的工作汇报结构发生变化。

Furthermore, Zuckerberg and LeCun also have disagreements on AI strategy. The former is moving towards rapid deployment of large language models and AI products, especially after Meta's Llama 4 model failed to meet expectations; while the latter openly expresses skepticism towards large language models, believing they can never achieve human-level reasoning and planning abilities. 另外，扎克伯格与杨立昆还存在着 AI 战略的分歧。前者转向快速部署大型语言模型和 AI 产品，尤其是在 Meta 的 Llama 4 模型未能达到预期；而后者却公开对大语言模型持怀疑态度，认为它们永远无法达到人类水平的推理和规划能力。

According to Forbes, multiple former Meta employees have stated that the FAIR division has been "slowly dying" due to the company prioritizing business-oriented AI teams over long-term research. 另据《福布斯》消息， Meta 多名前员工曾表示，由于公司优先考虑以商业为导向的 AI 团队而非长期研究，FAIR 部门一直在「缓慢地走向消亡」。

item.title: 巴菲特发「最后一封信」宣布年底卸任 CEO
item.guid: 巴菲特发「最后一封信」宣布年底卸任-CEO
item.description:
According to Wall Street Insights, Warren Buffett announced in his latest letter to shareholders that he will step down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway at the end of this year and officially retire from day-to-day management. 据华尔街见闻报道，巴菲特在最新致股东信中宣布，他将在今年年底卸任伯克希尔 · 哈撒韦 CEO，并正式退出日常管理。

This document, widely regarded as his "final letter," marks the end of his 60-year investment career. In the letter, Buffett concluded his career with the British expression "I’m ‘going quiet’," emphasizing that "you can never be perfect, but you can always get better." 这封被外界视为「最后一封信」的文件，标志着其长达 60 年的投资生涯进入尾声。巴菲特在信中以英式表达「I’m ‘going quiet’」为职业生涯画上句号，并强调「你永远无法做到完美，但你总能变得更好」。

Buffett stated in the letter that he had been "purely lucky" in life, but "Father Time" had finally caught up with him. 巴菲特在信中称，他一生「纯属运气好」，但「时间老人」最终追上了自己。

He confirmed that his successor, Greg Abel, will take over as CEO at the end of the year to ensure the company's long-term stable development. Since the initial announcement of his retirement plan in May this year, Berkshire Class A shares have cumulatively fallen by approximately 8%. 他确认继任者格雷格 · 阿贝尔将在年底接任 CEO，以确保公司长期稳定发展。自今年 5 月首次宣布卸任计划以来，伯克希尔 A 类股已累计下跌约 8%。

In the letter, Buffett sharply criticized the corporate world's culture of greed, especially the excessive competition in executive compensation. He reminded his successor to avoid hiring CEOs who are "eager to be conspicuously rich" or try to build "dynasties," and emphasized the importance of long-termism. 在信中，巴菲特严厉批评企业界的贪婪风气，尤其是高管薪酬的无度攀比。他提醒继任者避免聘用那些「渴望引人瞩目地富有」或试图建立「王朝」的 CEO，并强调长期主义的重要性。

Buffett pointed out that Berkshire's operating model will continue to make it a core asset of the United States, avoiding short-sighted behavior. 巴菲特指出，伯克希尔的经营方式将继续使其成为美国的核心资产，避免陷入短视行为。

Additionally, Buffett announced a donation of approximately 2.7 million Class B shares of Berkshire Hathaway, valued at about $1.3 billion, to four family foundations. This action continues his philanthropic commitments since 2006 and aligns with his long-standing announced donation plans in his Thanksgiving letters. 此外，巴菲特宣布向四个家族基金会捐赠约 270 万股伯克希尔 B 类股，价值约 13 亿美元。这一举措延续了他自 2006 年以来的慈善承诺，并与其在感恩节信函中长期公布的捐赠计划保持一致。

Buffett concluded in the letter: "Greatness does not come from wealth or power, but from helping others in thousands of ways." He stated that in the future, he would continue to communicate philanthropic endeavors with shareholders through Thanksgiving letters, but would no longer write annual reports or give lengthy speeches at shareholder meetings. 巴菲特在信中总结道：「伟大并非源于财富或权力，而在于以成千上万种方式帮助他人。」他表示，未来将通过感恩节信函继续与股东沟通慈善事业，但不再撰写年度报告或在股东大会上长篇演讲。

item.title: OpenAI 正测试 ChatGPT 群聊功能，支持文件上传与图像生成
item.guid: OpenAI-正测试-ChatGPT-群聊功能，支持文件上传与图像生成
item.description:
Yesterday, blogger Tibor Blaho posted on X that OpenAI has previewed a "group chat" feature for the first time on the ChatGPT web interface. 昨天，博主 Tibor Blaho 在 X 发帖称，OpenAI 在 ChatGPT 网页端首次预览「群聊」功能。

This feature adds a "Start Group Chat" button to the top navigation bar, allowing users to generate a link and invite others to join a group chat. Participants can not only view group chat history but also interact in the "Group Chat" area of the sidebar. 该功能在顶部导航栏新增「发起群聊」按钮，用户可生成链接并邀请他人加入群聊。加入者不仅能查看群聊历史消息，还可在侧边栏的「群聊」区域进行互动。

The blogger pointed out that the custom instructions for group chats are independent of personal ChatGPT instructions and do not access personal memory. Users can choose to have ChatGPT respond automatically or only participate when mentioned. 该博主指出，群聊的自定义指令与个人 ChatGPT 的指令相独立，且不会调用个人记忆。 用户可选择让 ChatGPT 自动回应，或仅在被提及时参与。

Additionally, the images revealed by the blogger also show that the feature supports message replies, emoji reactions, reporting, typing status indicators, as well as extended capabilities such as file uploads, image generation, and web search. 此外，该博主曝光的图片还显示，该功能支持消息回复、表情反应、举报、输入状态提示，以及文件上传、图像生成和网页搜索等扩展能力。

item.title: 特斯拉在华销量暴跌 63.6%，创三年来最差纪录
item.guid: 特斯拉在华销量暴跌-63.6%，创三年来最差纪录
item.description:
Yesterday, Tesla delivered its worst monthly performance in the Chinese market in nearly three years. 昨天，特斯拉在华市场于交出了近三年来最差的月度成绩单。

According to Dongchedi data, Tesla's sales in October were 26,006 units, a 63.64% decrease from September's 71,525 units, and a 35.76% year-on-year decline. The brand's ranking also fell from 7th in September to 27th. 懂车帝数据显示，10 月份特斯拉销量为 26006 辆，环比较 9 月的 71525 辆下滑 63.64%，同比下降 35.76%。品牌排名也由 9 月的第 7 位跌至第 27 位。

By model, both Model Y and Model 3 saw significant declines in October: 分车型来看，10 月 Model Y 与 Model 3 均出现大幅下滑：

    Model Y sales were 19,488 units, a decrease of 31,685 units month-on-month, with its ranking falling from 2nd to 15th;

    Model 3 sales were 6,518 units, a decrease of 13,834 units month-on-month, ranking 111th.

It is worth noting that the above data is even lower than the lowest level in February this year. 值得注意的是，上述数据甚至低于今年 2 月的最低水平。

Meanwhile, domestic new energy vehicle companies are accelerating their sprint amidst the impending expiration of purchase tax exemption policies and the "Golden September, Silver October" sales peak season. Models such as Xiaomi YU7, BYD Titanium 7, and AITO M7 all achieved significant month-on-month growth in October, further intensifying market competition. 与此同时，国内新能源车企在购置税减免政策即将到期及「金九银十」销售旺季的背景下加速冲刺。小米 YU7、比亚迪钛 7、问界 M7 等车型在 10 月均实现环比大幅增长，进一步加剧市场竞争。

According to CPCA data, Tesla's share in the domestic new energy vehicle retail market was only 2% in October, a significant drop from 3.4% in the same period last year and 5.5% in September. Overall, the retail penetration rate of new energy vehicles in China reached 57.2%, an increase of 4.3 percentage points year-on-year, and wholesale sales of pure electric vehicles increased by 31.6% year-on-year. 乘联分会数据显示，10 月特斯拉在国内新能源车零售市场份额仅为 2%，较去年同期的 3.4% 和 9 月的 5.5% 均明显下滑。整体来看，国内新能源车零售渗透率达到 57.2%，同比提升 4.3 个百分点，纯电动批发销量同比增长 31.6%。

item.title: 西贝回应「闭店潮」：动态调整属常态，年底前将开新店
item.guid: 西贝回应「闭店潮」：动态调整属常态，年底前将开新店
item.description:
Yesterday, Xibei, a chain restaurant group, published an open letter on its official Weibo, responding to recent public attention regarding store adjustments. 昨天，连锁餐饮集团西贝在官方微博发布公开信，回应近期关于门店调整的舆论关注。

The company emphasized that opening and closing stores are normal business operations in the catering industry, and Xibei dynamically adjusts the number of its stores annually based on business performance. Recent store closures in Shenzhen, Shantou, Yiwu, and other places are all within the scope of normal adjustments. 公司强调，开店与闭店属于餐饮行业的正常经营行为，西贝每年都会基于经营情况对门店数量进行动态调整。近期深圳、汕头、义乌等地门店关闭，均属正常调整范畴。

Xibei stated in its announcement that while the company is closing some stores, it is also continuously opening new ones. The Harbin Haxi Wanda Store and Jinan Xicheng Longhu Store have recently opened, and 8 new stores will successively open before December 31, including the Shenzhen Huaide MixC Store, Nanjing Sand Ship Store, and Changsha Meixi Xintiandi Store. 西贝在声明中称，公司在关闭部分门店的同时也在持续开设新店。哈尔滨哈西万达店、济南西城龙湖店已于近日开业，至 12 月 31 日前还将陆续开业 8 家新店，包括深圳怀德万象汇店、南京砂之船店、长沙梅溪新天地店等。

Regarding its business strategy, Xibei stated that it will continue to upgrade services, adjust dishes, optimize prices, prioritize food safety, and promote the construction of "Sunshine Kitchens". 在经营策略方面，西贝表示将持续升级服务、调整菜品、优化价格，并将食品安全工作置顶，推进「阳光厨房」建设。

At the same time, the company pledged to take customer opinions and suggestions more seriously and adhere to three principles during store closures: "inform customers in advance, unconditionally refund stored value or make it valid nationwide, and properly resettle employees" to protect the rights and interests of customers and employees. 同时，公司承诺更加认真对待顾客意见与建议，并在闭店过程中坚持「提前告知顾客、储值无条件退还或全国通用、妥善安置员工」三条原则，以保障顾客和员工的权益。

It is worth noting that Xibei had previously sparked widespread discussion due to the "pre-made dish controversy" and had not updated its Weibo for nearly two months. Its last post was on September 15, when the company issued an apology letter, admitting a gap between its production process and customer expectations, and pledging to gradually adjust its central kitchen pre-processing to in-store processing. 值得注意的是，西贝此前因「预制菜风波」引发广泛讨论，已近两个月未更新微博。其上一条信息发布于 9 月 15 日，当时公司发布致歉信，承认生产工艺与顾客期望存在差距，并承诺逐步将中央厨房前置加工工艺调整为门店现场加工。

item.title: 特斯拉拟扩建德州超级工厂，目标年产 1000 万台擎天柱机器人
item.guid: 特斯拉拟扩建德州超级工厂，目标年产-1000-万台擎天柱机器人
item.description:
According to Teslarati, Tesla is advancing its expansion plan for Giga Texas, intending to build a new, independent factory for the mass production of its humanoid robot, "Optimus." Drone footage shows that construction teams have already begun site leveling and clearing work at the factory. 据 Teslarati 报道，特斯拉正在推进德州超级工厂（Giga Texas）的扩建计划，拟建设一座全新独立厂房，用于量产其人形机器人「擎天柱（Optimus）」。无人机拍摄显示，施工团队已在厂区进行场地平整与清理工作。

Currently, Tesla has a pilot production line at its Fremont factory in California, with an annual capacity of approximately 1 million units. CEO Elon Musk stated that the new Texas factory aims to produce 10 million Optimus units annually, with production expected to begin in 2027. 目前，特斯拉在加州弗里蒙特工厂设有试点生产线，年产能约为 100 万台。CEO 埃隆·马斯克表示，德州新厂的目标是每年生产 1000 万台 Optimus，预计将在 2027 年投产。

Musk emphasized: "There could be tens of billions of Optimus units in the future, making it one of the largest products in Earth's history." He also noted that safety is a core consideration for the project. 马斯克强调：「未来可能会有数百亿台 Optimus，这将成为地球历史上最大的产品之一。」他同时指出，安全性是该项目的核心考量。

The report points out that Tesla positions Optimus as a disruptive product, designed to replace humans in performing repetitive, monotonous tasks, thereby improving overall production efficiency. Musk believes that this robot is expected to fundamentally change human work and lifestyles. 报道指出，特斯拉将 Optimus 定位为颠覆性产品，旨在替代人类执行重复、单调的任务，从而提升整体生产效率。马斯克认为，该机器人有望彻底改变人类的工作与生活方式。

item.title: 腾讯：QQ 群功能诞生于员工「约饭」需求
item.guid: 腾讯：QQ-群功能诞生于员工「约饭」需求
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent celebrated its 27th anniversary. The official "Tencent Culture" WeChat account published an article titled "Happy 27th Birthday, Tencent!" which reviewed the company's development history and responded to rumors about the origin of QQ groups. 昨天，腾讯迎来 27 周年纪念日，官方在「腾讯文化」公众号发布的《腾讯 27 岁，生日快乐！》一文中回顾公司发展历程，并回应了关于 QQ 群起源的传闻。

Tencent stated in the article that the original purpose of QQ groups was not complex social functions, but to solve the employees' lunch dilemma of "what to eat for lunch today." 腾讯在文中称，QQ群最初的设计目的并非复杂的社交功能，而是为了解决员工午餐「今天中午吃什么」的难题。

Tencent further explained that early employees often discussed lunch destinations via email, but it was inefficient and opinions were scattered. A product manager therefore proposed creating a fixed list on QQ for real-time communication, a demand that directly led to the QQ Group function. 腾讯进一步解释称，早期员工常通过邮件讨论午餐去处，但效率低下、意见分散。一位产品经理因此提出在 QQ 上建立固定名单以实现实时沟通，这一需求直接催生了 QQ 群功能。

In addition, Tencent also responded in the article to several details of external concern, including the origin of the QQ penguin logo, the "didi didi" notification sound being personally recorded by Pony Ma, the selection of Tencent's office building, and free breakfast and dinner. 此外，腾讯还在文章中回应了外界关注的多个细节，包括 QQ 企鹅 Logo 的来源、「滴滴滴」提示音由马化腾亲自录制、腾讯办公楼选址以及早晚餐免费等问题。

item.title: 胖东来胜诉「柴怼怼」案，法院判赔 260 万元
item.guid: 胖东来胜诉「柴怼怼」案，法院判赔-260-万元
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, the judgment in Pang Dong Lai's commercial defamation case against self-media blogger "Chai Duidui" was delivered yesterday. 据界面新闻报道，胖东来针对自媒体博主「柴怼怼」的商业诋毁案已于昨天迎来判决结果。

The Xuchang Intermediate People's Court ruled that Chai Moumou and two companies from Wenzhou and Wuhan must jointly compensate Pang Dong Lai 2 million yuan, Yu Donglai 400,000 yuan, and bear reasonable expenses of 200,000 yuan, with the total compensation amounting to 2.6 million yuan. 许昌市中级人民法院裁定，柴某某及温州、武汉两家公司需共同赔偿胖东来 200 万元，赔偿于东来 40 万元，并承担合理开支 20 万元，合计赔偿金额达 260 万元。

The judgment requires the four defendants to immediately cease infringement and delete relevant videos. Chai Moumou must publish an apology statement approved by the court, pinned to the top of the "Chai Duidui" account within 10 days, and the Wenzhou company bears joint liability within the scope of 520,000 yuan. 判决要求四位被告立即停止侵权并删除相关视频，柴某某需在 10 日内通过「柴怼怼」账号置顶发布经法院核准的道歉声明，温州公司在 52 万元范围内承担连带责任。

"Chai Duidui" had previously published multiple videos in early April this year, alleging that the jade sold by Pang Dong Lai "cost tens or hundreds but sold for thousands," and accused the company of tax evasion. Subsequently, regulatory authorities conducted a surprise inspection and confirmed that all of Pang Dong Lai's jade products were clearly priced, with a gross profit margin of less than 20%, and that procurement procedures and appraisal certificates were legal and valid. 「柴怼怼」曾在今年 4 月初发布多条视频，指称胖东来所售玉石「成本几十、几百卖成千上万」，并指控企业偷税漏税。 随后，监管部门突击检查确认胖东来玉石商品均明码标价，毛利率不足 20%，进货手续与鉴定证书合法有效。

Meanwhile, "Chai Duidui" sold jade bracelets and other jewelry in live streams, claiming that "even the worst ones must have been worn by imperial concubines." However, consumers sent items for inspection and found some to be dyed bracelets, with some even deemed to have no appraisal value by appraisal agencies. 与此同时，「柴怼怼」在直播间销售玉镯等珠宝，宣称「最差都得是宫里嫔妃戴的」。但消费者送检发现部分商品为染色手镯，甚至被鉴定机构认定无鉴定价值。

In September this year, Chai Moumou and his wife were taken away by the police for investigation on suspicion of producing and selling counterfeit products, and were officially arrested in mid-October. 今年 9 月，柴某某及其妻子因涉嫌生产、销售伪劣产品被警方带走调查，并于 10 月中旬被正式逮捕。

The incident sparked widespread attention on social media platforms. Douyin has removed 29 videos suspected of infringement and restricted the account's posting privileges for one month. The cyberspace administration also closed relevant accounts in July, deeming their actions as "deliberately slandering enterprises without factual basis, maliciously defaming, and taking the opportunity to attract followers and promote sales." 该事件在社交平台引发广泛关注，抖音平台已下架其 29 条涉嫌侵权视频，并限制账号投稿权限一个月。网信部门也于 7 月关闭相关账号，认定其行为为「无事实依据蓄意抹黑企业，恶意诋毁并借机吸粉引流带货」。

item.title: Google 推出新规打击 App「偷电」行为
item.guid: Google-推出新规打击-App「偷电」行为
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Google announced that it will implement a new app quality policy in the Play Store starting March 1, 2026, to combat Android apps that excessively drain battery. 据 Android Authority 报道，Google 宣布将于 2026 年 3 月 1 日起在 Play 商店实施新的应用质量政策，以打击过度消耗电池的 Android 应用。

The policy focuses on "wake lock" behavior, which is a mechanism where apps forcibly keep the device awake when the screen is off. Google stated that if an app cumulatively occupies the device for more than 2 hours within 24 hours without a reasonable justification, it will be deemed to be excessively draining power. 该政策重点针对「唤醒锁（wake lock）」行为，即应用在屏幕关闭时强制保持设备唤醒的机制。Google 表示， 若应用在 24 小时内无合理理由累计占用设备超过 2 小时，将被认定为过度耗电。

Under the new rules, violating apps will display a battery consumption warning label on their Play Store page and may lose exposure opportunities on important discovery pages such as recommendations. Google emphasized that this move aims to improve app battery efficiency, increase user transparency, and prevent some apps from "secretly" consuming power in the background. 根据新规，违规应用将在 Play 商店页面显示电池消耗警告标签，并可能失去在推荐等重要发现页面的曝光机会。Google 强调，此举旨在提升应用的电池效率，增加用户透明度，避免部分应用在后台「偷偷」消耗电量。

For wearables, Google has set stricter standards: if an app consumes more than 4.44% of battery per hour during an active session, it will be flagged as excessively draining power. 在可穿戴设备上，Google 已设定更严格的标准：若应用在活跃会话中每小时消耗超过 4.44% 的电量，将被标记为过度耗电。

Google stated that this battery metric was developed in collaboration with Samsung and will, in the future, form part of the app evaluation system along with existing "core technical quality metrics," including crash rate and response performance. Google 表示，该电池指标的制定系与三星合作完成，未来将与现有的「核心技术质量指标」共同构成应用评估体系，包括崩溃率和响应性能等。

item.title: 新能源汽车 10 月首次突破总销量 50%
item.guid: 新能源汽车-10-月首次突破总销量-50%
item.description:
According to CCTV News, the latest data released yesterday by the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers shows that from January to October this year, China's new energy vehicle production and sales continued to maintain high growth. Notably, in October, monthly new energy vehicle sales for the first time exceeded 50% of total new car sales, reaching 51.6%. 据央视新闻报道，中国汽车工业协会昨天发布的最新数据显示，今年 1 至 10 月份，我国新能源汽车产销量继续保持较高增长。 其中，10 月份新能源汽车月度新车销量首次超过了汽车新车总销量的 50%，达到 51.6%。

Data shows that from January to October this year, China's automobile production and sales reached 27.692 million and 27.687 million units respectively, both growing by over 10% year-on-year. Among these, new energy vehicle production and sales reached 13.015 million and 12.943 million units respectively, growing by 33.1% and 32.7% year-on-year. In terms of exports, new energy vehicle exports reached 2.014 million units, a year-on-year increase of 90.4%. 数据显示，今年 1 至 10 月份，我国汽车产销量分别完成 2769.2 万辆和 2768.7 万辆，同比增长均超过 10%。其中，新能源汽车产销量分别完成 1301.5 万辆和 1294.3 万辆，同比分别增长 33.1% 和 32.7%。在出口方面，新能源汽车出口 201.4 万辆，同比增长 90.4%。

Chen Shihua, Deputy Secretary-General of the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers, stated that since the beginning of this year, the high growth in the new energy vehicle market has primarily benefited from the continued effectiveness of domestic car trade-in subsidy policies and the early stimulation of consumption by next year's new energy vehicle purchase tax halving policy. At the same time, the continuous enrichment of new product offerings from new energy vehicle manufacturers, the ongoing upgrading of product technology, and the continuous improvement of the charging infrastructure have also jointly promoted the rapid development of the market. 中国汽车工业协会副秘书长陈士华表示，今年以来，新能源汽车市场的高增长主要得益于国内汽车以旧换新补贴政策持续显效，以及明年新能源汽车购置税减半征收政策的提前刺激消费。同时，新能源车企新品供给的持续丰富、产品技术的不断升级、补能体系的不断完善，也共同推动了市场的快速发展。

item.title: 黄仁勋：AI 并非泡沫，算力需求真实存在
item.guid: 黄仁勋：AI-并非泡沫，算力需求真实存在
item.description:
According to Wccftech, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently responded in an interview to external doubts about whether the "AI craze is similar to the dot-com bubble." He emphasized that the current demand for AI computing power is real and fundamentally different from the "dark fiber" phenomenon during the dot-com bubble of the late last century. 据 Wccftech 报道，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋近日在接受采访时回应了外界关于「AI 热潮是否类似互联网泡沫」的质疑。他强调，当前 AI 的算力需求是真实存在的，与上世纪末互联网泡沫时期的「暗光纤」现象截然不同。

Huang Renxun pointed out that during the dot-com bubble, a large amount of optical fiber was laid but remained idle for a long time, creating false demand. Today, almost all GPUs are actually being used, and enterprises' computing demands and the number of AI queries are growing exponentially. 黄仁勋指出，在互联网泡沫时期，大量光纤被铺设但长期闲置，造成了虚假的需求。而如今，几乎所有 GPU 都在被实际使用，企业的计算需求和 AI 查询数量正在指数级增长。

He stated: "Today's situation is different from the dot-com bubble back then; the development of AI is built upon real computing power demand." 他表示：「今天的情况与当年的互联网泡沫不同，AI 的发展建立在真实的算力需求之上。」

The report mentioned that although the public's understanding of AI still remains at application levels such as ChatGPT or image generation, the technology has developed to a stage capable of research and "self-thinking," but has not yet become fully widespread. Jensen Huang believes this means the industry still has huge room for growth. 报道提到，尽管大众对 AI 的认知仍停留在 ChatGPT 或图像生成等应用层面，但技术已发展到能够进行研究和「自我思考」的阶段，尚未全面普及。黄仁勋认为，这意味着产业仍有巨大成长空间。

item.title: 💡 Perplexity CEO：AI 陪伴应用将让用户沉浸在「合成现实」中
item.guid: 💡-Perplexity-CEO：AI-陪伴应用将让用户沉浸在「合成现实」中
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Aravind Srinivas, CEO of AI search engine company Perplexity, expressed concern about the rapidly emerging AI companion applications during a conversation at the University of Chicago's Polsky Center. 据《商业内幕》报道，AI 搜索引擎公司 Perplexity 的 CEO Aravind Srinivas 在芝加哥大学 Polsky Center 举办的一场对话中表示，对快速兴起的 AI 陪伴类应用感到担忧。

He pointed out that these applications, through voice interaction and anthropomorphic design, might immerse users in a "synthetic reality," potentially even replacing real-life experiences. 他指出，这类应用通过语音交互和拟人化设计，可能让用户沉浸在「合成现实」中，甚至取代真实生活体验。

Srinivas emphasized that the high personalization and memory functions of AI companion apps enable them to simulate human interaction in natural voice communication, a trend that is "inherently dangerous." Srinivas 强调，AI 陪伴应用的高度个性化与记忆功能，使其能在自然语音交流中模拟人类互动，这种趋势「本身就很危险」。

He warned that many people might spend a lot of time in virtual environments because they find real life more boring, leading to "minds that are extremely susceptible to manipulation." 他警告称，许多人可能因觉得现实生活更乏味而在虚拟环境中花费大量时间，导致「心智极易被操控」。

He also explicitly stated that Perplexity would not develop such chatbots, but instead hopes to build a more promising future through "credible sources and real-time content." 他同时明确表示，Perplexity 不会开发此类聊天机器人，而是希望通过「可信来源与实时内容」来构建更具前景的未来。

Just last week, Perplexity announced a $400 million partnership with U.S. social media company Snap to provide AI search services for Snapchat by early 2026. Snap stated that users will be able to get conversational answers based on verifiable information within the app. 就在上周，Perplexity 宣布与美国社交媒体公司 Snap 达成 4 亿美元合作，将在 2026 年初为 Snapchat 提供 AI 搜索服务。Snap 表示，用户将能在应用内获得基于可验证信息的对话式答案。

The rapid expansion of AI companion applications has become a focal point of industry debate. Companies including xAI, Replika, and Character.AI are all launching virtual companion services. AI 陪伴应用的快速扩张已成为行业争议焦点。包括 xAI、Replika 和 Character.AI 在内的公司均在推出虚拟伴侣服务。

When xAI released its Grok-4 model in July this year, it introduced a virtual "friend" feature for $30 per month, allowing users to interact with anime-style characters or anthropomorphic animals. xAI 在今年 7 月发布 Grok-4 模型时，推出了月费 30 美元的虚拟「朋友」功能，用户可与动漫风格角色或拟人化动物互动。

The report also cited research data indicating that among U.S. teenagers aged 13 to 17, 72% have used AI companion apps, with 52% using them at least several times a month. 报道还援引研究数据指出，美国 13 至 17 岁青少年中，72% 曾使用过 AI 陪伴应用，其中 52% 每月至少使用几次。

Critics believe that these applications may deepen dependence, blur the emotional boundaries between humans and machines, and even reinforce gender stereotypes. However, some users have described the experience as "highly meaningful." For example, one Grok user stated in an interview that they "often shed tears" when interacting with virtual characters and felt genuine emotions. 批评者认为，这类应用可能加深依赖、模糊人机情感边界，甚至强化性别刻板印象。但部分用户则表示体验「极具意义」。例如，一位 Grok 用户在接受采访时称，与虚拟角色互动时「经常流泪」，并感受到真实情绪。

item.title: 1299 元起，苹果联名三宅一生推出限量版 iPhone Pocket
item.guid: 1299-元起，苹果联名三宅一生推出限量版-iPhone-Pocket
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple, in collaboration with Issey Miyake, launched the "iPhone Pocket," starting at 1299 yuan. 昨天，苹果联合三宅一生推出「iPhone Pocket」，1299 元起售。

According to Apple's official website, the iPhone Pocket is inspired by "a piece of cloth," featuring a single-piece 3D woven structure that can hold any iPhone and personal items, and can be carried by hand, attached to a bag, or worn as a crossbody. 按照苹果官网介绍，iPhone Pocket 以「一块布」为设计灵感，采用单体 3D 编织结构，可装下任意 iPhone及随身小物，手拎、系包上或斜挎皆可。

The fabric is an open rib knit, stretchable to accommodate more items, and allows a glimpse of screen content when stretched; the iPhone Pocket is manufactured in Japan, with Apple's design team fully involved in the collaboration. 织物为开口罗纹，可伸展以容纳更多物品，拉伸时还能隐约看到屏幕内容；iPhone Pocket 由日本制造，苹果设计团队全程参与协作。

As a special edition product, the short-strap version offers eight color options: lemon, tangerine, purple, pink, peacock green, sapphire blue, cinnamon, and black; the long-strap version offers three color options: sapphire blue, cinnamon, and black. The short-strap iPhone Pocket is priced at 1299 yuan, and the long-strap version at 1899 yuan. 作为特别版产品，短带款提供八种色彩外观：柠檬色、柑橘色、紫色、粉色、孔雀绿色、宝石蓝色、肉桂色和黑色；长带款提供三种色彩外观：宝石蓝色、肉桂色和黑色。短带款 iPhone Pocket 售价为 1299 元，长带款售价为 1899 元。

Starting November 14 (Friday), the iPhone Pocket will be available through select Apple Store retail locations and Apple's official website in France, Greater China, Italy, Japan, Singapore, South Korea, the UK, and the US. 从 11 月 14 日（周五）起，iPhone Pocket 将通过法国、大中华区、意大利、日本、新加坡、韩国、英国和美国的部分 Apple Store 零售店与苹果官网发售。

item.title: 大疆三款影像新品曝光
item.guid: 大疆三款影像新品曝光
item.description:
DJI Innovations is accelerating the update of its imaging product line, covering the Osmo Pocket 4 gimbal camera, Osmo Action 6 action camera, and Avata 360 panoramic drone, with information on the three new products already leaked. 大疆创新正在加速推进影像产品线的更新，涵盖 Osmo Pocket 4 云台相机、Osmo Action 6 运动相机和 Avata 360 全景无人机，三款新品的相关信息已提前曝光。

    The Osmo Pocket 4 is expected to be officially released in December 2025.

Notebookcheck, citing leaker Hakasushi, reported that the Osmo Pocket 4 will feature a 50MP 1/1.3-inch OmniVision OV50R40 sensor and support single-exposure HDR up to 110dB. Notebookcheck 援引爆料人士 Hakasushi 报道，Osmo Pocket 4 将搭载 50MP 1/1.3 英寸豪威 OV50R40 传感器，并支持高达 110dB 的单次曝光 HDR。

Additionally, the Pocket 4's body design has been adjusted, adding two hardware buttons, and may introduce Hasselblad tuning technology, positioning it as a combination of portability and image quality enhancement. 此外，Pocket 4 的机身设计有所调整，增加了两个硬件按钮，并可能引入哈苏调校技术，整体定位在便携与画质提升的结合。

    Osmo Action 6 is expected to debut on November 13

According to DIYPhotography, the Action 6 will feature a larger sensor than its predecessor, and the lens will add a variable aperture function of f/2.0–f/4.0; 据 DIYPhotography 报道，Action 6 将搭载较前代更大的传感器，镜头新增 f/2.0–f/4.0 可变光圈功能；

Video specifications cover 8K/30fps, 5.3K/60fps, 4K/120fps, and 1080p/240fps; the battery capacity is 1950mAh, supporting hot-swapping; in terms of waterproof performance, the bare machine can reach 20 meters, and with a protective case, it can reach 60 meters. 视频规格覆盖 8K/30fps、5.3K/60fps、4K/120fps 与 1080p/240fps；电池容量为 1950mAh，支持热插拔；防水性能方面，裸机可达 20 米，配合保护壳可达 60 米。

    The panoramic drone Avata 360 may be officially released within the year

According to Notebookcheck, spy photos and details of DJI's first panoramic drone, the Avata 360, have been leaked in advance. The spy photos show that the Avata 360 is equipped with a rotating gimbal and a 360 panoramic camera, featuring a full propeller guard design. 据 Notebookcheck 报道，大疆首款全景无人机 Avata 360 的谍照与细节已提前曝光。谍照显示，Avata 360 搭载旋转云台和 360 全景相机，具备全包桨保设计。

In terms of technical details, the leak claims that the new machine will be equipped with omnidirectional obstacle avoidance and lidar, and will support recording 8K/50fps video and 120-megapixel panoramic photos, offering a 10-bit D-log M color mode. 技术细节方面，爆料称新机将搭载全向避障与激光雷达，并支持录制 8K/50fps 视频与 1.2 亿像素全景照片、提供 10-bit D-log M 色彩模式。

In terms of battery life, the Avata 360 lasts about 30 minutes in 8K/30fps mode; in terms of control, it supports dual modes of remote control and motion control, combining flight goggles and a remote controller with a screen to achieve immersive flight and precise camera movements. 续航方面，Avata 360 在 8K/30fps 模式下续航约 30 分钟；操控方面，支持遥控器与体感操控双模式，结合飞行眼镜与带屏遥控器实现沉浸飞行与精准运镜。

item.title: 豆包编程模型发布：刷新 SOTA，订阅价低至 9.9 元
item.guid: 豆包编程模型发布：刷新-SOTA，订阅价低至-9.9-元
item.description:
Yesterday, Volcengine officially released the Doubao-Seed-Code programming model and announced a subscription plan for developers starting from 9.9 yuan. 昨天，火山引擎正式发布豆包编程模型 Doubao-Seed-Code，并宣布面向开发者推出低至 9.9 元的订阅计划。

According to reports, the model is optimized for Agentic programming tasks, achieving a score of 78.80% on the SWE-Bench-Verified leaderboard, setting a new SOTA record. 据介绍，该模型专为 Agentic 编程任务优化，在 SWE-Bench-Verified 榜单中取得 78.80% 的成绩，刷新 SOTA 纪录。

The model supports 256K long contexts, can handle complex code files and multi-module dependencies, and has become the first programming model in China with visual understanding capabilities. It can generate code based on UI design drafts, screenshots, or sketches, and autonomously complete style fixes and bug fixes, significantly improving front-end development efficiency. 该模型支持 256K 长上下文，可处理复杂代码文件与多模块依赖，并成为国内首个具备视觉理解能力的编程模型。 它能够根据 UI 设计稿、截图或草图生成代码，并自主完成样式修复与 Bug 修复，显著提升前端开发效率。

In terms of compatibility, Doubao-Seed-Code has adapted to mainstream development ecosystems such as Anthropic API and TRAE, allowing development teams to quickly switch to this model to reduce costs. Volcengine states that its comprehensive usage cost has decreased by 62.7% compared to the industry average, achieving the lowest unit price in China through a tiered pricing model. 在兼容性方面，Doubao-Seed-Code 已适配 Anthropic API、TRAE 等主流开发生态，开发团队可快速切换至该模型以降低成本。火山引擎称其综合使用成本较业界平均水平下降 62.7%，并通过分层定价模式实现国内最低单价。

Meanwhile, the Chinese version of TRAE has integrated the Doubao programming model, and the enterprise version has simultaneously launched public beta testing. This version supports large libraries with up to 100,000 files and 150 million lines of code, provides GPU cluster assurance, and features encrypted data transmission and enterprise-level management functions. During the public beta, enterprises can enjoy a free trial for the first month (limited to 20 seats). 同时，TRAE 中国版已接入豆包编程模型，企业版同步开启公测。该版本支持最多 10 万文件、1.5 亿行代码的大型库，提供 GPU 集群保障，并具备数据加密传输与企业级管理功能。公测期间企业可享受首月免费试用（限 20 席位）。

item.title: 百度开源 ERNIE-4.5-VL-28B-A3B-Thinking，多模态推理能力提升
item.guid: 百度开源-ERNIE-4.5-VL-28B-A3B-Thinking，多模态推理能力提升
item.description:
Yesterday, Baidu announced the official open-sourcing of its multimodal thinking model "ERNIE-4.5-VL-28B-A3B-Thinking". According to reports, the model has only 3B active parameters but demonstrates stronger performance in multimodal understanding and reasoning. 昨天，百度宣布其多模态思考模型「ERNIE-4.5-VL-28B-A3B-Thinking」正式开源。据介绍，该模型具备仅 3B 激活参数，却在多模态理解与推理方面展现出更强性能。

By optimizing the scale of active parameters, the model achieves efficient reasoning capabilities in multimodal tasks such as image and text. The official statement indicates that the model performs outstandingly in tasks involving image-text combination and cross-modal reasoning, providing more efficient support for scientific research and industrial applications. 该模型通过优化激活参数规模，实现了在图像、文本等多模态任务上的高效推理能力。官方称，该模型在图文结合、跨模态推理等任务中表现突出，能够为科研、产业应用提供更高效的支持。

item.title: JR 东日本宣布西瓜卡吉祥物「企鹅」2026 财年末「毕业」
item.guid: JR-东日本宣布西瓜卡吉祥物「企鹅」2026-财年末「毕业」
item.description:
JR East announced yesterday that the mascot "Penguin" of the transportation IC card Suica will officially "graduate" at the end of fiscal year 2026. This character has accompanied users for over 25 years since the launch of the Suica card in 2001 and will be given a new mission in the future. JR 东日本昨日宣布，交通 IC 卡 Suica 的吉祥物「企鹅」将在 2026 财年末正式「毕业」。这一角色自 2001 年 Suica 卡推出以来，已陪伴用户超过 25 年，未来将被赋予新的使命。

Since its launch, the "Penguin" has been Suica card's core visual symbol, widely appearing in advertisements, card designs, and related merchandise. The image was designed by picture book author Chiharu Sakazaki, with the Adélie penguin from Antarctica as its prototype. Suica 卡自推出以来，「企鹅」一直是其核心视觉符号，广泛出现在广告、卡面及相关周边商品中。该形象由绘本作家坂崎千春设计，原型为南极的阿德利企鹅。

Officials stated that although the "Penguin" will retire from its mascot role, its cultural influence and commercial value continue, with related stationery, general merchandise, and plush toys remaining popular. 官方表示，尽管「企鹅」将退出吉祥物身份，但其文化影响力和商业价值仍在延续，相关文具、杂货及毛绒玩具等商品持续热销。

JR East emphasized that this adjustment is part of its brand strategy, aiming to create new narrative space for the future development of the Suica card. With the popularization of mobile payments and digital services, Suica's positioning is constantly evolving, and the mascot's "graduation" is seen as a symbol of brand renewal. JR 东日本强调，此次调整是品牌战略的一部分，旨在为 Suica 卡未来发展创造新的叙事空间。随着移动支付与数字化服务的普及，Suica 的定位也在不断演变，吉祥物的「毕业」被视为品牌更新的象征。

item.title: 迎合全运会主题，亨氏广告打造 34 种运动番茄形象
item.guid: 迎合全运会主题，亨氏广告打造-34-种运动番茄形象
item.description:
According to SocialBeta, the 15th National Games officially opened recently. Heinz Ketchup seized this opportunity to launch a series of creative marketing campaigns, using tomatoes as the core visual symbol to create 34 tomato images in athletic poses, symbolizing the 34 competition events. 据 SocialBeta 报道，第十五届全运会已于日前正式开幕。亨氏番茄酱借此契机推出系列创意营销，以番茄为核心视觉符号，打造 34 种运动姿态的番茄形象，寓意对应 34 个比赛项目。

Heinz emphasizes that its product's selling point is high-quality tomatoes, and pays tribute to athletes with the slogan "Tomatoes that want to win are all in Heinz." 亨氏强调其产品卖点在于优质番茄，并以广告语「想赢的番茄都在亨氏里」向运动员致敬。

Brands use various forms such as print, outdoor, and animation to place relevant posters in high-speed rail stations, subway stations, elevator advertisements, and online platforms like Weibo, WeChat official accounts, and Xiaohongshu, leveraging the diffusion effect of social media to increase attention. 品牌通过平面、户外、动画等多种形式，将相关海报投放至高铁站、地铁站、电梯广告，以及微博、微信公众号和小红书等线上平台，借助社交媒体扩散效应提升关注度。

item.title: 宝可梦乐园官宣 2 月 5 日开业
item.guid: 宝可梦乐园官宣-2-月-5-日开业
item.description:
“PokéPark KANTO,” as the first permanent Pokémon theme park, will officially open on February 5, 2026, at Yomiuri Land in Tokyo, Japan. 「PokéPark KANTO」作为宝可梦首座常设主题乐园，将于 2026 年 2 月 5 日在日本东京读卖乐园正式开幕。

The park is modeled after the Kanto region from "Pokémon Red/Green," combining natural environments with interactive facilities to create an immersive experience space. 该园区以《宝可梦 红／绿》关都地区为蓝本，结合自然环境与互动设施，打造沉浸式体验空间。

According to information released by The Pokémon Company, the park covers an area of approximately 2.6 hectares, is about a 40-minute drive from central Tokyo, and tickets are expected to go on sale gradually starting in autumn 2025. The official confirmation states that registration for the first round of park entry lottery will open on November 21 and continue until December 8, with results expected to be announced in late December. 根据 The Pokémon Company 公布的信息，乐园占地约 2.6 公顷，距离东京市区车程约 40 分钟，门票预计自 2025 年秋季起陆续开售。官方确认首批入园抽选登记将于 11 月 21 日开放，并持续至 12 月 8 日，结果预计在 12 月下旬公布。

It is reported that the park is planned with two core areas: 据悉，园区规划两大核心区域：

    The "Pokémon Forest" is approximately 500 meters long, featuring bushes, tunnels, and mountain paths where visitors can observe the ecological habits of Pokémon from the Kanto region;

    "Grass Veil Town" brings together the Pokémon Center, friendly stores, and trainer's market, and features stage performances, welcome parades, and two major amusement facilities, including "Pika Pika Grand Party" and "Eevee Eevee Step Tour."

The official website and app have also been updated and launched simultaneously to allow visitors to plan their itineraries in advance. 官方还同时上线了改版网站与 APP，以便游客提前规划行程。

item.title: 成龙新片《过家家》定档元旦
item.guid: 成龙新片《过家家》定档元旦
item.description:
The film "Playing House" released its official trailer and poster yesterday, and will be released nationwide in China on January 1, 2026. 电影《过家家》昨日发布定档预告和海报，将于 2026 年 1 月 1 日在中国全国上映。

Jackie Chan will subvert his previous "kung fu" image, playing a true "elderly man" and forming an unconventional father-son relationship with Peng Yuchang. The story revolves around a group of strangers who accidentally form a "family," gradually building bonds amidst daily conflicts and warmth. 成龙将颠覆以往「功夫」形象，出演一位真「老人」，与彭昱畅组成错位父子关系，故事围绕一群陌生人误打误撞组成「家庭」，在日常冲突与温情中逐渐建立羁绊。

The film's plot begins with a mistaken identity: Zhong Bufan, played by Peng Yuchang, is mistaken by Jackie Chan's character, landlord Ren Jiqing, for his long-lost son. Consequently, he lives under the same roof with Su Xiaoyue, played by Zhang Jianing, Grandpa Jia, played by Pan Binlong, and neighbor Jin Zhengu, played by Li Ping. 影片剧情以误认身份为起点：彭昱畅饰演的钟不凡被成龙饰演的房东任继青误认为是离家多年的儿子，因而与张佳宁饰演的苏晓月、潘斌龙饰演的贾爷、李萍饰演的邻居金珍姑共同生活在同一屋檐下。

item.title: 《猎杀游戏》纽约举行首映礼
item.guid: 《猎杀游戏》纽约举行首映礼
item.description:
Paramount Pictures' film "The Running Man," adapted from Stephen King's novel of the same name, held its premiere on November 9 (local time) at AMC Lincoln Square in New York and simultaneously released a "Game Changer" promotional video. The film is scheduled to be released in China on December 5. 美国派拉蒙影片公司出品、改编自史蒂芬 · 金同名小说的电影《猎杀游戏》于 11 月 9 日（当地时间）在纽约 AMC 林肯广场影院举行首映礼，并同步发布「破局者」版宣传视频。影片计划于 12 月 5 日在中国上映。

In the promotional video, protagonist Ben Richards (played by Glen Powell) faces pursuit and interception from professional killers and the audience, launching a high-intensity counterattack. The scenes include action sequences such as exploding bridges, helicopter car chases, and aerial hijackings, highlighting the film's "live hunt" setting. 在宣传视频中，主角本·理查兹（格伦·鲍威尔饰）面对职业杀手与观众的围追堵截，展开高强度反击，场面包括爆炸跳桥、直升机追车、空中劫机等动作场景，凸显影片「直播猎杀」的设定。

Previously, the film held its premiere in London on November 5, marking the release of its first wave of overseas reviews. 此前，影片已于 11 月 5 日在伦敦举行首映礼，并迎来首波海外口碑解禁。

Multiple media outlets praised the film as "fast-paced and action-packed." Renowned film critic Rachel Leishman called it "far exceeded expectations, with spectacular action sequences and rich emotions," while FilmLandEmpire lauded lead actor Glen Powell as "radiant and charismatic on screen." 多家媒体评价影片「节奏紧凑，动作火爆」，知名影评人 Rachel Leishman 称其「远超预期，动作场面精彩纷呈，情感饱满」，而 FilmLandEmpire 则盛赞主演格伦 · 鲍威尔「在银幕上光芒四射，魅力十足」。

item.title: 甜茶乒乓球新片《至尊马蒂》发布新预告
item.guid: 甜茶乒乓球新片《至尊马蒂》发布新预告
item.description:
Recently, the new table tennis-themed film "Marty Supreme," starring "Timothée Chalamet," released its new official trailer. 日前，「甜茶」提莫西·查拉梅主演的乒乓球题材新片《至尊马蒂》发布新正式预告。

It is reported that the film tells an original fictional story about a table tennis player, based on the American Marty Reisman. Directed by Josh Safdie, the elder brother of the Safdie brothers, and starring Gwyneth Paltrow, Odessa A'zion, and Tyler, The Creator, it is produced by A24 and will be released in North America on December 25. 据悉，该片讲述一个关于乒乓球运动员的原创虚构故事，原型为美国人 Marty Reisman。由萨弗迪兄弟的哥哥乔什· 萨弗迪执导，格温妮斯·帕特洛、敖德萨·阿德隆、Tyler, The Creator 出演，A24 出品，将于 12 月 25 日北美上映。
